prompt: Add missing ML-specific tools (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, sklearn, OpenAI, LangChain) to résumé.

category.prompt: Tailor résumé for a role deploying LLMs into production using vector databases and RAG techniques.
Rewrite résumé to emphasize experience with supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
Ask: “Describe a time you had to debug a model that performed well offline but poorly in production.”
Improve keyword coverage: SOC2, SIEM, firewalls, zero trust, OWASP Top 10, endpoint protection, MFA.
Tailor résumé for a security engineer at a fintech company — focus on encryption, compliance, and threat detection.
Rewrite résumé to emphasize SOC analysis, incident response, and cloud security audits.
Ask: “Walk through how you’d secure a multi-cloud environment and respond to a zero-day exploit.”
Add keywords: SLAs, SLIs, SLOs, on-call, Chaos Engineering, observability, alerting, incident response.
Rewrite résumé for a role focused on reliability engineering in a distributed, high-scale environment.
Emphasize on-call management, root cause analysis, and tooling to reduce MTTR.
Ask: “How do you prioritize alerts and measure the effectiveness of your observability stack?”
Ensure terms like Backstage, developer portal, self-service infra, GitOps, and abstraction layers are included.
Rewrite résumé to reflect building an internal developer platform (IDP) focused on DX (developer experience).
Tailor résumé to a role focused on automating developer onboarding and CI/CD pipelines as products.
Ask: “How do you measure success for platform adoption across engineering teams?”
Add keywords like few-shot prompting, RAG, embeddings, token limits, OpenAI, LangChain, vector stores.
Optimize résumé for a Prompt Engineer designing a custom GPT-like chatbot for internal use.
Emphasize testing frameworks, latency reduction, and hallucination mitigation in LLM apps.
Ask: “How would you debug a retrieval-augmented LLM system returning irrelevant answers?”
Improve résumé with Solidity, Ethereum, smart contracts, DeFi, gas optimization, EVM tooling.
Rewrite résumé for a Web3 dev focused on smart contract security and audit readiness.
Tailor résumé for experience launching token projects or DAOs.
Ask: “How do you prevent reentrancy attacks in Solidity contracts?”
Add RTOS, SPI, I2C, UART, C++, firmware, bare-metal, assembly, interrupt handling.
Tailor résumé for real-time embedded development for medical or automotive devices.
Rewrite experience to reflect performance tuning in low-power microcontrollers.
Ask: “How would you debug inconsistent sensor readings in an embedded system?”
Emphasize roadmap delivery, stakeholder management, Jira, backlog grooming, KPIs, API-first thinking.
Rewrite résumé for a TPM leading cross-functional delivery between data and platform teams.
Tailor for a role where TPM is expected to own OKRs and coordinate engineering/deployment cycles.
Ask: “How do you handle prioritization conflict between engineering and sales?”
Add: GDPR, CCPA, HIPAA, ISO27001, audit trail, PII masking, data retention policies, privacy-by-design.
Optimize résumé for a privacy engineer ensuring data compliance in a SaaS platform with global users.
Rewrite résumé to reflect experience automating compliance checks and reporting for audits.
Ask: “How would you design a system to ensure ‘right to be forgotten’ compliance?”
Add: Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, TestNG, Puppeteer, load testing, CI test coverage, BDD, TDD.
Rewrite résumé for an engineer automating test coverage in a fast-moving CI/CD pipeline.
Tailor résumé for QA engineer with performance testing focus for high-load APIs.
Ask: “How do you balance fast release cycles with test coverage reliability?”
Rewrite résumé bullets to quantify impact (e.g., “Reduced model inference latency by 45%”).
Optimize summary section for recruiter + ATS readability.
Suggest 3 certifications or projects that increase ATS visibility and recruiter attention.
Format résumé for clean, ATS-compliant layout — no tables, no headers/footers, consistent fonts.
